column1: Cognate with Karakhanid [script needed] ‎(kertü, “truth, oath”), Old Uighur [script needed] ‎(kertü, “truth”), [script needed] ‎(kertgün-, “to believe”), Azeri gərçək ‎(“true”), Khakas киртiнерге ‎(kirtinerge, “to believe”), Turkmen gerçek ‎(“brave, courageous”), Yakut кырдьык ‎(kırcık, “true, veritable, exact”).
*Not used, but perhaps rarely - chiefly grammatical formations. Note: Plural forms are not used with adjectives.
